items.title: AI technology is blowing up on Fiverr 2023
items.summary: Fiverr now offers AI services to enhance your business! With new categories for AI artists and applications, you can find high-quality and cheap artworks, articles, and more. Utilize the power of ChatGPT, an advanced language model by OpenAI, for article writing, customer support, data analysis,…
items.content_html:
Fiverr now offers AI services to enhance your business! With new categories for AI artists and applications, you can find high-quality and cheap artworks, articles, and more. Utilize the power of ChatGPT, an advanced language model by OpenAI, for article writing, customer support, data analysis, chatbots, and content generation. Also, try out Midjourney & Dall-E for AI-image generation and stunning artworks. Get ahead of the competition with AI solutions on Fiverr!

Elevate your business success with cheap and high quality artworks and articles made by Artifical Intelligence! Search for Fiverr services where talented sellers will help your business success. Don't miss out on the latest and greatest services on Fiverr! Whether you're looking to improve your business, save time and money, or just need help with a project, Fiverr has the solutions you need. Click the link now and discover all the new services available to you today!¬†

There are so many different possible applications for AI services, Fiverr had to create several new categories to cope with all the new services offered. Here is an overview of the AI services categories now available on Fiverr. In this guide I will teach you how you can make the most out of this trend and stay on top of your competitors.

AI-image generation - Midjourney and Dall-E

Midjourney has become popular over night with its stunning abilities to generate images. All you have do as an AI artist is to come up with great ideas, write them down in form of prompts and elevate the visual quality by using Midjourneys command chains.¬†

Midjourney AI is a powerful image generation tool that businesses can use to create stunning artworks with ease. This AI technology is designed to generate images based on specific inputs, such as keywords, themes, and styles, making it an ideal solution for businesses that need to create eye-catching graphics and images.

These are a few examples of artworks that I have created in Midjourney and that are being used by book authors, news papers, musicians and more. The possibilites are endless, although there are limitations.

On Fiverr, businesses can access a range of AI services, including image generation, that are designed to help them save time and improve their workflows. Whether you need images for your website, social media accounts, or marketing campaigns, Midjourney AI can help you create stunning artworks with ease.

By using Midjourney AI for your image generation needs, you can save time, resources, and money, while still producing high-quality graphics and images that will engage your audience and help you stand out from the competition. So why not explore the AI services available on Fiverr and see how Midjourney AI can help your business create stunning artworks with ease!

Check out these community showcases of Midjourney to get an idea of what it is capable to generate. Keep in mind that these images are results of hours of rerolling and prompt-crafting.¬†

https://www.midjourney.com/showcase/recent/

Limitations of Midjourney

Midjourney AI is a powerful tool for image generation, but it has some limitations. It may not produce the same level of creativity and artistry as a human artist, and there may be limitations to the complexity and uniqueness of the images generated.

When you want to use Midjourney, make sure to contact the Fiverr seller first. Let them know the application of the artworks and what exactly you have in mind. Many times, the results will need additional editing and retouching in photoshop. But still, these results are mind-blowing to say the least.¬†

Limitations are likeliness of real people, because Midjourney will always change something about the face or the appearance. Also hands and general anatomy are difficult to get right with Midjourney. It takes more time or additional editing.¬†

AI technology - ChatGPT

If you haven't heard of ChatGPT, you must be living under a rock!

ChatGPT is a natural language model. AI that you can ask anything and that will return cohesive sentences about any topic. You can write whole articles with it (this one is human written though, it cannot fully replace human writing. ü§ì )

¬†
This is how chatGPT describes itself and its use for freelancing services:

ChatGPT is a pre-trained language model developed by OpenAI that generates human-like text based on input prompts. It can be used for various natural language processing tasks, including freelancing services such as content creation, data analysis, and customer support.

The applications of such a powerful tool for your business are huge! You can easily write articles, FAQ's and detailed explanations in a glimpse. Even complex topic or creative explorations of ideas is possible. If you want to outsource, you can use one of the many chatGPT services on Fiverr to push out more content and reach a bigger audience!

As businesses continue to adopt new technologies, the use of AI-powered solutions is becoming increasingly common. One such solution is ChatGPT, an advanced language model developed by OpenAI that can be used to improve various aspects of your business. Here are five ways you can leverage the power of ChatGPT for your business and increase your earnings through the popular freelancing platform, Fiverr.

  1. Article Writing: ChatGPT can be used to automate the process of article writing, saving you time and money. With its advanced language generation capabilities, ChatGPT can create high-quality, informative articles on any topic, making it an ideal tool for content creators and marketers.

  2. Customer Support: ChatGPT can be integrated into your customer support systems to provide quick, accurate, and personalized responses to customer queries. With its ability to understand context and generate human-like text, ChatGPT can help you improve your customer satisfaction levels and reduce response times.

  3. Data Analysis: ChatGPT can analyze large amounts of data, extract insights, and provide summaries, saving you time and money on data analysis services. With its advanced capabilities, ChatGPT can help you make better business decisions and stay ahead of the competition.

  4. Chatbots: ChatGPT can be used to develop chatbots for your business, allowing you to provide 24/7 support to your customers. With its advanced language generation capabilities, ChatGPT can create chatbots that can understand and respond to customer queries in a natural, human-like manner.

  5. Content Generation: ChatGPT can be used to generate high-quality content for your business, including blog posts, social media updates, and more. With its advanced language generation capabilities, ChatGPT can help you create engaging and informative content that will keep your customers interested and coming back for more.

  6. Your own ChatGPT based application: You can even create your own ChatGPT applications on Fiverr. Many different websites are using it to generate AI Content already. So you can start your own business by elevating ChatGPT's incredible results into content.¬†

By leveraging the power of ChatGPT for your business, you can save time, money, and resources, and improve your overall bottom line. So why not take advantage of this powerful AI solution and start using it for your freelancing services on Fiverr today!

Conclusion

Thank you for reading my guide to the new AI services on Fiverr. They are blowing up right now, so make sure to stay on top of the changes in the business world! Never be afraid to try out new things, but also make sure to know how much a great (human) writer or artist is worth! AI may have incredible results, but the work of some talents is still unreachable for AI. And without their talent, it would not be possible for the AI to be trained in such a way.

¬†

items.title: Gig ideas to make money on Fiverr in 2023
items.summary: Do you want to get started on Fiverr and create a new gig that can help you make fast money on Fiverr? In this guide, you will find gig ideas of unsaturated gig categories or nich√© gig ideas. Other ideas are not new, but are…
items.content_html:
Do you want to get started on Fiverr and create a new gig that can help you make fast money on Fiverr? In this guide, you will find gig ideas of unsaturated gig categories or nich√© gig ideas. Other ideas are not new, but are still amazing opportunities to make fast money on Fiverr in 2023.

Gigs related to YouTube

YouTube is one of the biggest platforms creating content. It is run by Google and has billions of dollars in Ad revenue every year. That is a lot of money! And you can benefit from this massive economy by offering related services on Fiverr. It is a future proof way of making money, since YouTube is an ever growing giant platform with many different forms of content. This will allow you to find a nich√© category within YouTube content creators that you can specifically target for your Fiverr gigs. This way you may be able to find some new gig ideas to make money on Fiverr.

I have listed various services you can offer related to YouTube:

  • Thumbnail Design
  • Video Editing
  • Topic / Keyword Research
  • Competitor Analysis
  • SEO for description and video titles
  • Video Scripting
  • Video Translation / Transcribing

Make sure that you try to be specific and target down a specific set of content creators who might need your help. The more specialized you are, the better. But don't nich√© down too deep, since it might also limit you in your capabilities of receiving new orders.¬†

Current revenues of Youtube and expected growth

Take a look at this statistic that will show you how much money is made on YouTube every year and how the expected growth is providing you a good future proof opportunity to earn money on Fiverr.¬†

Source:https://www.statista.com/statistics/289657/youtube-global-quarterly-advertising-revenues/

Translation gigs

This is one of the best ways to get started on Fiverr. You can translate english into your native language and when you speak a language that not many people offer, you can still¬†have a good chance of making some quick sales on Fiverr.¬†

Again, you can try to find an unsaturated nich√© and offer specialized translations. Translating from Technical English to Technical Spanish and vice versa for example.

Game development in Unity or Godot

Game development is very popular and it is easy to teach yourself through YouTube channels like brackeys. If you are capable of creating your own small projects, you will be able to provide these services on Fiverr and make money quickly. Beware that you need some kind of proof of work and work samples.¬†

To get started, Godot is much easier and it's also faster in developing simple games. So if you plan to make quick money, you might want to check out this game engine as well.

Creating Advertisements and Marketing strategies

The spending on mobile and desktop Advertisement is a growing market. Especially the mobile advertisement sector is expecting strong growth in the next few years according to statista.

Source: https://www.statista.com/outlook/dmo/digital-advertising/social-media-advertising/worldwide#ad-spending

To benefit from this strong market sector, you can offer related services on Fiverr.¬†

These gig ideas can help you make money on Fiverr in this sector. They have a strong potential even in the years to come:

  • Creating a Marketing strategy for every platform
  • Creating a YouTube marketing strategy
  • Creating a TikTok marketing strategy
  • Creating Video advertisement optimized for mobile ads
  • Setting up an advertising campaign on Google Ads

Note: You need a certain set of skills to offer gigs on Fiverr in this category. Not everyone is familiar with effective marketing strategies and if you want to be successful on Fiverr and actually make money off your gigs, you need to offer valuable skills.

If you want to get started and learn how to create effective marketing plans to offer as a Fiverr gig, you can start by checking out this TED Talk:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yoD8RMq2OkU

Research Services

You can offer doing research for others. If you are familiar with a field and have experience in this, you can offer research for nich√©s. For example medical research, travel research or freelancing. It can be research about anything and if you choose the right category, you can secure a few quick sales.¬†

If you want to make quick money in this category, try to be as specific as possible and find a small area that you can cover.

Ideas for more specific research categories:

  • Medical information
  • Travel destinations and guides
  • Market trends
  • News trends and public figures
  • History (Medieval, Ancient, Roman Empire, Cold War, World Wars etc.)
  • Freelancing and Business Trends
  • Books and Literature

Discord Server setups

This is a quickly growing category, because Discord becomes more and more popular outside of the gaming community where it originated. You can offer Discord server setups, bot automation and more. These types of orders are not too difficult to finish and can help you make fast money on Fiverr. It is however going to be highly saturated soon, so make sure to get in there quickly and establish yourself as a trusted Seller on Fiverr.

Discord Bot Programming

Similar to Discord Server setup, you can offer to program and create Discord bots for server automation. These bots can do all kinds of tasks and can be very complex or rather simple. If you have basic programming skills in Python, you can easily get started and jump on the train of this quickly growing Fiverr category.

Business Names and Slogans

This category is well established, but everyone with a creative and business mind can offer these services and think of great names and slogans for companies.¬†

But be aware, this is again, not an easy way to make money. (There is no easy way to make money on Fiverr), because coming up with business ideas and slogans sounds easier than it is. Good business names convey various images of a business and can also have a subconscious layer. So don't jump right into this gig idea, but make sure you are capable of delivering amazing results, otherwise the start as a new seller on Fiverr will be way more difficult.¬†

Greeting Videos

One of the first categories of Fiverr gigs that went viral! Think of Fiverr Jesus, or other unique ways of creating greeting videos that went viral on YouTube and social media. Funny and creative greetings videos are still a thing and if you come up with crazy and funny ideas, you can still make a quick sale here as well.¬†

Writing Gigs

Another gig category that you can get into is Article & Blog Writing. Don't get me wrong, writing requires a variety of skills. Creative thinking, understanding of flow of writing and grammar. But, when you are capable of writing fluently in your language, you will be able to offer these services on Fiverr and make some quick money as well. These Fiverr gigs are very popular and it will not be the easiest start, but if you pick one of the examples here you might get a headstart in an unsaturated nich√©.

  • Article writing
  • Blog Posts Writing
  • Business Emails
  • Engaging Social Media posts
  • Social media captions
  • Tweets about NFTs
  • Products Description
  • Business names and slogans
  • Articles about comedy, freelancing, travel guides, diet plans, business ideas

Image Editing

Another common gig idea for beginner sellers on Fiverr is image editing. If you know your way around photoshop editing, you can use this tool in many ways to make money on Fiverr. Again, you can be very specific to establish yourself in an unsaturated category.¬†

  • Beautify your portraits in photoshop
  • Remove your background (note: this is very saturated, MANY sellers offer this.)
  • Convert images and logos to vector graphics
  • Coloring of old photos

If you do not have a Photoshop license (which is required to sell your work!) You can look at free alternatives like https://www.gimp.org/

It can do most of the things photoshop can do and it's completely free.

Background Removal is one of the easiest ways to make money on Fiverr, but it was advised so many times and everybody can do it, so you will have a hard time to find customers as a new seller. Still, I will leave this free tool here to remove backgrounds from images that you can use in your Fiverr gig.

Free tool for Background Removal

One Tap - Pixlr Remove Background: https://pixlr.com/remove-bg/

Conclusion

In this article, I offer you some starting points as a new seller on Fiverr. These gig ideas are not a 100% guarantee that you will make money on Fiverr or even receive an order! But, when you offer a valuable skill that you are able to show examples of, the possibility is good that you will land your first order with these gig ideas.¬†

You have learned about these possible ways to make money on Fiverr:

  • Translation services
  • Game development in Unity or Godot
  • Services related to YouTube
  • Creating Advertisements and marketing strategies
  • Research Services
  • Discord Server setups
  • Discord Bot Programming
  • Business Names and Slogans
  • Greeting Videos
  • Writing Gigs
  • Image Editing

¬†

items.title: Fiverr Myths Debunked
items.summary: 12 Fiverr Myths that new sellers should learn the truth about If you are a new seller on Fiverr, chances are that you have heard many tips and tricks about how to rank your gig, how to increase impressions and clicks. If you struggle to…
items.content_html:
12 Fiverr Myths that new sellers should learn the truth about

If you are a new seller on Fiverr, chances are that you have heard many tips and tricks about how to rank your gig, how to increase impressions and clicks. If you struggle to get your first order or the impressions on your gigs are very low, then you might wonder why.¬†Some of these seem obvious, but I've seen so many new sellers fall for this "quick and easy money" tips.¬†Unfortunately, there are too many people giving bad advice to new sellers.

Tips (myths) for easy success on Fiverr

  • Stay Online 24/7

  • Instant responses and 100% response rate
  • Gig rotation can be influenced
  • Review exchange can boost your Fiverr gig performance
  • Offering free work to get reviews
  • Send as many buyers requests as possible (or react to the new buyer request matches)
  • Promote your Fiverr gigs on Social Media
  • Fiverr is easy and fast money
  • Fiverr and Paypal have no fees
  • Making money on Fiverr is passive income
  • Anybody can be successful on Fiverr
  • Success is based on luck

They will be debunked now, for good.¬†

That's why I wrote this guide for new sellers on Fiverr to clear out some of the myths that have spread around the internet about how you can rank your gig. So if you see any other Fiverr seller giving you one of these 12 tips, just post this gif and leave the chat. üòé

If you need a Fiverr discord server with experienced sellers, feel free to join the Fiverr Insiders community. https://disboard.org/server/1008862116205301841

Fiverr Myth #1 - Stay Online 24/7

Staying online 24/7 to boost your gig ranking performance is a myth and does not help at all. No single human can be online all the time, only bots and auto refreshers can. Fiverr might consider your account suspicious when it is online 24/7.

Additionally, if you are online, get a message but are not able to properly answer your client (because you actually sleep) it will make a much worse impression than answering when you are back online.¬†

When a client sees your gig and the gig is well made, with promising work samples and a well made and concise gig description, the client will be compelled to message you. Not because you are online, but because your work looks promising!¬†

What's more important than your online time is your answer rate and your average response time.

Fiverr Myth #2 - Instant responses and 100% response rate

Instant responses with a very low response rate increase gig traffic and ranking.

It is true that the response time matters. Remember you have 24 Hours to respond! After that it will negatively affect your response rate and this will in turn have a negative effect on your gig ranking & impressions. So keeping a 100% is possible and important for your gig ranking. But it is easy to do it yourself. There is no need for automatic responses that will automatically keep your response rate at 100%. Be careful about that response rate, because it can derank you if you already have a Fiverr Seller Level.

Being responsive and active is important to be successful on Fiverr. Even more important is how you respond. But what is key when getting a message in from someone in your Fiverr inbox that seems interested in your services? What clients actually want is an honest, concise answer of you will be the right choice. Show your client a solution strategy¬† and how you would tackle their problem. This will increase their confidence to make the right decision when hiring you.¬†

Fiverr Myth #3 - Gig rotation

Gig rotation was a thing on early Fiverr, but since the freelancing platform has seen a massive growth in new sellers and buyers, the simple rotation of gigs to the first places in search results is over. New sellers need to be way more thoughtful about their gig category and service nich√© when creating a new gig. Some categories are so overwhelmed with offers and are so competitive, that you will have a hard time starting out.
But, if you use correct keywords, preferably keywords that are not overused by other sellers, you have a good chance of landing your first orders and gaining a reputation as a good seller. Getting 5-star reviews will help boost your gig ranking and performance and increase your impression and click rate a lot.¬†

Fiverr gig rotation is a myth, but it's not 100% untrue. The search results have improved a lot since the early days of Fiverr and now they are tightly based on the buyers portfolio as well as the sellers skills.

The rotation is there, but it's minimal. There is randomness involved. It only switches around the gigs when the results show, but Fiverr will not randomly rotate gigs down and up the search results. The algorithm is much more advanced than that.¬†

Fiverr Myth #4 - Review exchange can boost your Fiverr gig performance

Review exchange is against Fiverr‚Äôs terms of service and will get you banned quickly. It is also very obvious. Fake reviews are also not worth it.

Reviews do not have the weight as they used to be, but reviews from Fiverr Select buyers, or repeating buyer reviews are something that can really boost your gigs ranking.¬†

Reviews that did not come from your amazing work and professional attitude will just result in your gig or account being banned. If anybody offers you a review exchange or suggests it to you, block them and move on.¬†

Fiverr Myth #5 - Offering free work can help you get started

A big no from me. This is very bad advice in my opinion! Offering free work will put you in a bad light. There is no reason that you should ever offer your work for free. People will reach out to you and you might get some exposure by offering free work, but in the end these people are only going to use you and won‚Äôt ever see you as a freelancer who they need to pay.

Stick to your prices, know your worth and the worth of your work.¬†

There is an exception to this rule. If you don't have the proper skills to offer services, then you should not trick any buyer into spending money on¬† you. Its okay to build your portfolio with projects from others. I still recommend you to find your own ideas for projects, these will help you learn much more than doing work for free.¬†

Fiverr Myth # 6 - Send as many buyers requests as possible

Sending all possible buyers requests is not worth your time and will not help you get sales and orders quicker. Only send buyers requests that you think you can actually provide a valuable offer for. Take the time and write a detailed solution strategy and why the client should hire you. Don't go overboard and write too much. Be concise and try to make a sale! Spamming those buyer requests won't help your gig performance or conversion at all.

Fiverr Myth #7 - Promote your Fiverr gigs on Social Media

It has been said before, but posting your gigs on your personal social media account wont help you at all. These people that you will reach through your promotion are not potential clients. Find out better ways to promote your Fiverr gigs and try to reach out directly to potential buyers. Read more about ‚ÄúHow to promote your Fiverr gigs on Discord‚Äù in our upcoming guide. There you will learn how you can use Discord for promoting directly to your target audience and build a network of potential clients.

Fiverr Myth #8 - Fiverr is easy and fast money

Not at all. Fiverr is a highly competitive marketplace with low prices and very skilled freelancers offering their work. If you do not put in the time to create a gig that sticks out and follows all the rules of SEO, with good work samples, then you will have a very hard time on Fiverr.¬†

You need a skillset that people are willing to pay money for, otherwise it is unlikely that you will get easy and fast money, if any.¬†

Fiverr Myth #9 - Fiverr and Paypal have no fees

Fiverr does have a 20% fee for sellers. The fiverr fees are what they are and it's not a small amount of money. Additionally, the withdrawal on Fiverr can also include fees from Payoneer, the Fiverr Revenue Card or through PayPals currency conversion fees.

Luckily, you can keep track of your fiverr fees using the Fiverr Fees Calculator. Use it to determine your hourly rate after all the fees were calculated. üëç

Fiverr Myth #10 - Making money on Fiverr is passive income

Many people that post and comment about their Fiverr experience label their income as passive income. That is NOT the case! Fiverr orders have to be actively worked on, sometimes with unexpected challenges and more effort than you anticipated. Having a successful Fiverr profile, even for some easy side money / beermoney, Fiverr requires sellers to be active alot. You need to answer messages, respond properly to get orders, and update your gigs. Only the process of researching a category that you can create your gig in, writing optimized descriptions and titles can take a lot of work if done right.

Calling making money on Fiverr passive income is just plain wrong. But, it can be less stressful than a side job (as a student for example) because you can always decide yourself how much work you take on. So as a side hustle for easy money it can be a great opportunity, but it's never passive. Your Fiverr Seller profile always needs your attention, otherwise it will go downhill quickly.

Fiverr Myth #11 - Anybody can be successful on Fiverr

In a way that is true. It is true, because anybody can learn valuable skills these days. YouTube is full of free tutorials, you can find virtually any question answered through Google or DuckDuckGo. There are huge amounts of resources on any skill you like to learn.¬†

But, without a valuable skill that people are willing to pay real money for, you are never going to be successful on Fiverr. It's the hard truth, but if you are here to look for fast and easy money on Fiverr, I can tell you with certainty that you are on a path that is never gonna lead to success.

Fiverr Myth #12 - Success is based on luck

You cannot make it on Fiverr or as a Freelancer. Only lucky people or very smart people can be successful. You should just give up.¬†

But thats not the case. You can. Everyone can. If you want it hard enough. üòé

Pick a skill that you want to provide and LEARN AND MASTER IT. Put in the time and effort, ask other people who have those skills for feedback.

Improve, fail, improve, and repeat.

Until you finally have the skills that you need to be successful on Fiverr.

These skills can include programming, search engine optimization skills, advanced photo editing and many many more. The more difficult the skill is to learn, the better people will pay you for your work. That's the way it works in the business world and Fiverr is no exception.

So get started today. Stop wasting time. Learn the skills you need and improve them until you have the tools to be successful.¬†

Thanks for reading and good luck!

items.title: How to create a video thumbnail to boost your Fiverr gig
items.summary: Creating a video thumbnail for your Fiverr gig can boost your search ranking and click rate. In this guide you will learn step by step how to create your own video thumbnail for your Fiverr gig.¬†Creating a video is not easy if you don‚Äôt have…
items.content_html:
Creating a video thumbnail for your Fiverr gig can boost your search ranking and click rate. In this guide you will learn step by step how to create your own video thumbnail for your Fiverr gig.¬†Creating a video is not easy if you don‚Äôt have experience in Adobe software, but in this guide you will learn how to create a video thumbnail for your Fiverr gig using free tools.

But first, let me show you the results of using a video thumbnail for your Fiverr gig. It has a visible impact and it will improve your chances of success on Fiverr.

Higher impressions on Fiverr gig after uploading a video thumbnail

When you are having problems with your gig impressions and click rate, creating a video for your thumbnail is one of the best ways to increase your gig ranking performance. It will boost your gig impressions and also result in a higher click rate.

You can see here how uploading a video thumbnail boosted my Fiverr gig ranking. It resulted in alot more impressions and clicks on my gig and it directly helped me get more orders. Follow my tutorial on how to create a Fiverr video thumbnail to gain more exposure on the Fiverr gig ranking.

But, how do you create a video that will help your Fiverr gig performance?

If you are not a professional with video editing software like Adobe Premiere and After Effects, you can use a free video editor that I found and used for my own Fiverr gig video. It is easy to use and gives you the option to choose different animation / transitions.

¬†

Step 1 ‚Äì Collect your best work samples

This is a crucial step! You want amazing work samples to showcase in the video, this is more important than anything else. If you don‚Äôt have a lot of work samples, my advice is that you create more personal projects so you have enough work samples for your Fiverr gig video.

Great work samples need to fulfill these requirements:

  • showing the best of your abilities
  • be proof of the quality that you promise to provide
  • have a realistic purpose, but do not have to be real client work
  • do not have any errors or mistakes in them
  • easy to understand

Step 2 ‚Äì Create animated images inforgraphics with Pixlr

This free image editor allows you to create images and edit your work samples. You could add arrows for example. Then, you can use their animaton tool for images. It will create a cool animation of your image elements which you can use in your Fiverr video thumbnail.

You can simply select one of the animation styles (some are free, some are only for premium) but the freebies are very good and sufficient for creating an enganging Fiverr video thumbnail.

¬†

Step 3 ‚Äì Use flexclip for easily creating free video thumbnails for Fiverr

Now when you have work samples and animated images ready, you can start creating and editing your video thumbnail for Fiverr in this free video editor. https://www.flexclip.com/editor/app?ratio=landscape

It is a free tool and super easy to use. They also have a lot of templates to use as starting point, but I suggest you start with an empty project and create everything yourself. It is not as difficult as it seems if you follow this guide on how to create a video for Fiverr thumbnail step by step!

Step 4 ‚Äì Import Media to Flexclip

Create a new video project on flexflip and import your media. Images, videos, anything you created in the first steps and that you want to show in the video thumbnail when someone sees your Fiverr gig in the search results.

¬†

Step 5 ‚Äì Drag and drop all your samples and animated images into the timeline

After you imported your media files to the video editor, you can start drag and dropping the images and animated images onto the timeline (in the bottom)

¬†

Step 6 ‚Äì Arrange your media on the timeline of your video thumbnail

After you have arranged everything in the order you want the video to showcase your work, you can start to add transitions and animations. Click on each image in the timeline and then select the animation menu from the top bar.

¬†

Step 7 ‚Äì Animate your images

The animation menu will show and allow you to pick an animation for the image. I like the zoom in and out options. But be careful not to overuse the animations. It‚Äôs a good idea to only use it on the most special images.

¬†

Step 8 ‚Äì Find a free soundtrack

There are tons of musicians that offer their music and sounds for free on the internet!

https://pixabay.com/music/

Pixabay for example is a great resource for music and soundtracks. If you like, you can credit the musician for their free work. But it is not a neccesity.

Always make sure you use music and images that are royalty free, meaning you can freely use them, otherwise Fiverr will delete your video thumbnail and might even deactivate your gig or ban your account. So make sure to use soundtracks from Pixabay in your Fiverr video thumbnail.

You can use the keyword ‚Äúcinematic‚Äù for example to find epic soundtracks. Depending on your Fiverr gig, you want to search for different soundtracks that fit your video thumbnail best.

Example cinematic soundtracks

Source: https://pixabay.com/music/search/cinematic/

¬†

Step 9 - Add the Audio to your video thumbnail

Now¬† that you have selected a soundtrack / music for your Fiverr gig, you can add it the video in the video editor by clicking on the Add Audio button in the bottom left.

¬†

Step 6 ‚Äì Upload your new video thumbnail to your Fiverr gig page

On your Fiverr dashboard, open your gigs table. There, click the gig you want to add the video thumbnail to. Click edit.

This will open your gigs detailed edit view. Select Gallery there, scroll down and add your video to your Fiverr gig.

¬†

Step 7 ‚Äì Manually select a thumbnail for your video thumbnail

Fiverr automatically selects a random thumbnail from the video. It‚Äôs a random frame so you might want to selec tit manually so the video thumbnail shows up exactly as you planned in the search results of Fiverr.

After clicking the edito video button on your Fiverr gig, you can select the preview thumbnail manually. All you have to do is stop at the right time and Click ‚ÄúSet as Preview‚Äù.

Conclusion

That‚Äôs it! Save your gig and wait a minute or two for the changes to be reflected in the Fiverr search results. Then search for your gig and check your new video thumbnail. Congratulations, you made it through. Now you have a good chance of increasing your Fiverr gigs peformance. The impressions will go up and your click rate will be higher than before. Its almost guaranteed.

Good luck with your future adventure as a seller on Fiverr!
